text.en: Add 1 "Special Schedule" or "Urgent Schedule" from your Deck to your hand, then you can Special Summon 1 "Schedule Token" (Machine/EARTH/Level 10/ATK 3000/DEF 3000) to your opponent's field. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Level 10 Machine monster in your GY or banishment; send 1 card you control to the GY, and if you do, Special Summon that monster. You can only use each effect of "Exceptional Schedule" once per turn.
